django-tastypie-elasticsearch's documentation
===========================================

This Django application provides ElasticSearch_ support for Tastypie_.

.. _Tastypie: https://github.com/toastdriven/django-tastypie
.. _ElasticSearch: http://elasticsearch.org/

For now, the API is subject to changes.

Source Code and Issue Tracker
-----------------------------

there_.

.. _there: https://github.com/llonchj/django-tastypie-elasticsearch
